mapper.insert: insert into tbl_project_in (prj_in_no, email, auth_id, prj_in_d8, prj_out_d8, prj_no) values ( tbl_project_in_seq.nextval, #{leader_email}, 1, #{lead_prj_in_d8}, #{lead_prj_out_d8}, #{prj_no})
insert into tbl_project_in (prj_in_no, email, auth_id, prj_in_d8, prj_out_d8, prj_no) values ( tbl_project_in_seq.nextval, #{follower_email}, 0, #{follow_prj_in_d8}, #{follow_prj_out_d8}, #{prj_no})
